name: Pulse Systems
overview: Pulse Systems, Inc., a healthcare software company, develops and markets information management solutions in the United States. It offers medical practice management and ambulatory healthcare software solutions. The company provides Pulse Patient Relationship Management that streamlines the functionality for front, clinical or middle, and back office operations, as well as integrates patient flow, workflow, and cash flow applications. The Pulse Patient Relationship Management solution also includes practice management, scheduling, billing and collection, contract administration, electronic health records, e-prescribing, electronic orders and results, document imaging and management, electronic charting, automated E/M coding, and voice recognition, as well as pocket PC wireless solution for physicians and nurses; and physician Web portal and ambulatory surgical center solutions. In addition, the company offers consulting services, including customized programming, technical training and assistance, functional training and assistance, accounts receivable analysis, system analysis, data quality review, operational review and assessment, and educational training services; and third party interfaces and data conversions. It serves small to large physician groups, single-site and multi-site practices, multi-specialty organizations, ambulatory surgical centers, management services organizations, and integrated delivery networks. Pulse Systems, Inc. was formerly known as Advanced Health Care Systems Inc. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Wichita, Kansas with regional offices in Methuen, Massachusetts; Dallas, Texas; and Kansas City, Missouri. As of July 27, 2010, Pulse Systems, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Cegedim SA.
